data.name: Get 28% OFF with no minimum spend

reward.name: Get 28% OFF with no minimum spend
reward.description: Get 28% OFF with no minimum spend from Zalora
reward.terms_and_conditions:
• Valid only at www.zalora.com.my/ZALORA mobile app for NEW user and single usage only
  • Voucher availability is base on first come first served, while stocks last
  • The Promo code is only applicable to items sold by ZALORA
  • Only one Promo Code may be used at a time
  • Not valid with other voucher code and promotions, unless otherwise stated
  • Free delivery is only applicable on paid price of RM75 and above
  • The Promo Code does not apply for certain excluded brands and item as set out at www.zalora.com.my/brand-exclusions
  • The Terms of Service set out at https://www.zalora.com.my/terms-of-use/ shall apply to all uses of the Promo Code
  • ZALORA reserves the right to change the Terms and Conditions or cancel any promotions at any time without prior notice
  • This voucher entitles customer to enjoy the special discounted price, no charging is done by ABC, customer is to make the payment directly to the merchant at outlet
  • Rewards vouchers are not exchangeable for cash, nor exchangeable for other Rewards vouchers under any circumstances. Rewards should not be sold, exchanged or transferred for value under any circumstances
  • For other Terms and Conditions refer to ABC.my/rewardstnc

reward.name: RM4.99 for an Art Class
reward.description: RM4.99 for an Art Class from My Art Studio worth RM35
reward.terms_and_conditions:
• Each user entitled for 1 voucher within the promotion period
  • Voucher availability is based on first come first served, while stocks last
  • Reservation is required at least one week in advance to ensure there is availability based on outlets
  • Booking subject to availability
  • Booking needs to be made by contacting MY ART Studio HQ at 014-3330941 by providing
    1. Name
    2. Date of reservation
    3. Preferred location
    4. Unique Codes
  • Customer will be advised on the availability. Once availability is confirmed, walk into the class by presenting the code at the counter prior to the session

  • For other Terms and Conditions refer to ABC.my/rewardstnc

data.name: 50% off ABC WiFi pass from RM0.50 (NP:RM1)

reward.name: 50% off ABC WiFi pass from RM0.50 (NP:RM1)
reward.description: Introductory promotion. 50% off for all access unlimited WiFi pass at over 7,000 locations.
reward.terms_and_conditions:
• This reward does not give you ABC WiFi access.
  • ABC WiFi pass can only be purchased at the participating outlets above.
  • The introductory promo prices are only valid until 31st October 2019. 
  • At ABC WiFi participating outlet, please ensure the WiFi settings is switched on before proceed to ABC-wifi.net
  • Quality of Service is benchmarked at 4Mbps.
  • Customer is entitled to WiFi connection upon purchase of a WiFi pass.
  • ABC WiFi is currently offer for ABC Customers only, for non ABC Customers, please stay tune for ABC WiFi next announcement.
  • All purchases for ABC WiFi will be charged to your Postpaid Bill or Prepaid Account Balance.
